title: How to Delete a Wooplus Account

steps.title: Open WooPlus on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open WooPlus on your phone or tablet. This app icon looks like two overlapping hearts on an orange-and-red background. You'll find it on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. If you pay a subscription fee, you'll need to cancel it before deleting your account to avoid further charges. To cancel a Google Play subscription, check out How to Cancel Google Play. To cancel through the App Store, see How to Cancel Subscriptions on iPhone.

steps.title: Tap the circular profile icon.
steps.content: Tap the circular profile icon. You'll find this in the top left corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Help & Feedback.
steps.content: Tap Help & Feedback . You'll see this in the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Tap How can I delete my account?.
steps.content: Tap How can I delete my account? . You'll see this at the bottom of the menu. You might need to tap More if you see that at the bottom of the page instead.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This window warns you that deleting your account is irreversible and that you will not be able to reactivate or retrieve any of your messages or matches.

steps.title: Tap a reason for deleting.
steps.content: Tap a reason for deleting. After you tap a reason, another window will pop up.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . You'll get a confirmation window that your account has been deleted. [1] X Research source If you are having trouble deleting your account this way, you can always send an email to support@wooplus.com. [2] X Research source
